lines.text: Darkness beyond twilight, crimson beyond blood that flows, buried in the flow of time is where your power grows. I pledge myself to conquer all the foes who stand in front of this mighty gift bestowed in my unworthy hand. Let the fools who stand before us be destroyed by the power you and I possess. Dragon Slave!
I landed on the guy I wanted to save!
"Um... well... you see..." MY ASS! YOU'VE LED US RIGHT INTO A DEAD END!

[as the Dragon Fang gang closes in on a solitary Lina, Gourry suddenly appears]
Stop right there!

[pauses to strike a heroic pose]
If I gave you my name, you'd only get it dirty.
Where monsters rampage, I'm there to take them down! Where treasure glitters, I'm there to claim it! Where an enemy rises to face me, victory will be mine!
